title: apartment!
body: <!-- id=198--><!-- isMature=0 -->it's that time of year.  anyone know of any large, dog-friendly apartments with off-street parking within 20 minutes of BrandLogic?  For under $700?  Preferably way under.  And it'd be great if they had 2 bedrooms, storage, dishwasher and disposal too.
bodyArticleHtml:
2003-07-15

apartment!

it's that time of year. anyone know of any large, dog-friendly apartments with off-street parking within 20 minutes of BrandLogic? For under $700? Preferably way under. And it'd be great if they had 2 bedrooms, storage, dishwasher and disposal too.
